Package mvc.controller

Class AdvancedStockController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mvc.controller.SimpleStockController
      • mvc.controller.AdvancedStockController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockController
    public class AdvancedStockController
extends SimpleStockController
    The AdvancedStockController class is the new controller that supports upgraded functionality over the SimpleStockController. This new controller now supports operations like plotting, re-balancing, save/load, etc... The AdvancedStockController extends the SimpleStockController and adds support for the new features while calling the super class to handle unchanged inputs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdvancedStockController

        public AdvancedStockController​(BetterStockManager model,
                               TextStockView view,
                               java.lang.Readable readable)
        Constructs an AdvancedStockController object. This constructor replaces the StockManager interface from the super constructor with the BetterStockManager interface that extends the model's functionality.
        Parameters:
        model - the model of the program
        view - the view of the program
        readable - handle user input

    • Method Detail

      • controllerGo

        public void controllerGo()
                  throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Starts the controller program and scans for user input. Any input for old/existing functionality is passed to the old SimpleStockController method. All added functionality is now handled using the AdvancedPortfolioMenu.
        Specified by:
        controllerGo in interface StockController
        Overrides:
        controllerGo in class SimpleStockController
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - throws for illegal inputs.
